name: Ommantra
0:
”Alexa, play om mantra”
”Alexa, open om mantra”
”Alexa, launch om mantra”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: om mantra
Developer Terms of Use
des:
OM is the Primordial Sound of the Universe. Its the sound that reverberates in the entire cosmos and in every cell of our body. We recommend that you use this for at least 30 mins a day, and meditate along with it

To play Om mantra in Alexa just enable this skill and say
Alexa, play om mantra
Alexa, open om mantra
Alexa, launch om mantra

If your facing any issues or need any improvements to the skill, please leave valuable feedback to us so it will really help us in updating the skill or leave us a review if you're enjoying our skill so it would help us in reaching a larger audience.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
